strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Check out good looking people on HOT or NOT.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT: HOT or NOT Copyright (c) 2006 Ron Huang Fan of HOT or NOT? You are in luck. This gadget allows you to check out the good looking people on HOT or NOT using Google Desktop Gadget.
strings.strImageToolTip: Click on the radio buttons above to vote.
strings.strOpenToolTip: Opens this person's page with browser.
strings.strRatingToolTip: The average rating others gave to this person.
